docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Local school districts across the metropolitan region are facing some of the stiffest financial pressures in years, just as their states, also struggling to balance budgets, are cutting aid to them.

headline.main: Tax Revolts and Cuts in Aid Batter Schools

docs.snippet: LEAD: Local school districts across the metropolitan region are facing some of the stiffest financial pressures in years, just as their states, also struggling to balance budgets, are cutting aid to them.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The educational-industrial complex is regularly counting the students of America (and these days that's anyone between ages 3 and 93).
